content: Sporting event delegation [Singapore](/wiki/Colony_of_Singapore) competed at the [1952 Summer Olympics](/wiki/1952_Summer_Olympics) in [Helsinki](/wiki/Helsinki), [Finland](/wiki/Finland). ## Athletes The following Singaporean athletes participated in the games: ### Athletics - [Tang Pui Wah](/wiki/Tang_Pui_Wah) ### Swimming Men *Ranks given are within the heat.* AthleteEventHeatSemifinalFinalTimeRankTimeRankTimeRank[Neo Chwee Kok](/wiki/Neo_Chwee_Kok)[100 m freestyle](/wiki/Swimming_at_the_1952_Summer_Olympics_%E2%80%93_Men%27s_100_metre_freestyle)1:00.63Did not advance[400 m freestyle](/wiki/Swimming_at_the_1952_Summer_Olympics_%E2%80%93_Men%27s_400_metre_freestyle)4:57.53Did not advance ### Weightlifting - [Chay Weng Yew](/wiki/Chay_Weng_Yew) (6th place) - [Lon Bin Mohamed Noor](/wiki/Lon_Bin_Mohamed_Noor) (8th place) - [Thong Saw Pak](/wiki/Thong_Saw_Pak) - Official Olympic Reports This [1952 Olympics](/wiki/1952_Summer_Olympics)-related article is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it. - v - t - e This article about sports in Singapore is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it.
title: Singapore at the 1952 Summer Olympics
